hero.title: Elevate Your Event
hero.subtitle: Premium Live Entertainment
hero.description: World-class orchestra and DJ services for corporate events, religious celebrations, and private occasions.

corporate.title: Corporate Events
corporate.shortDescription: Elevate your corporate gatherings with sophisticated live entertainment.
corporate.description: From galas and award ceremonies to product launches and company celebrations, we create the perfect ambiance for your corporate events. Our versatile musicians adapt to any atmosphere, ensuring your event leaves a lasting impression.

barMitzvahs.title: Bar & Bat Mitzvahs
barMitzvahs.shortDescription: Celebrate this milestone with unforgettable music and energy.
barMitzvahs.description: We specialize in creating magical Bar and Bat Mitzvah celebrations that honor tradition while bringing modern excitement. Our experienced team knows exactly how to engage guests of all ages and make the honoree feel like a star.
features: Custom hora and candle lighting music

privateEvents.title: Private Events
privateEvents.shortDescription: Make your special moments truly extraordinary.
privateEvents.description: Whether it's a wedding, anniversary, birthday milestone, or intimate gathering, we bring warmth and sophistication to your celebration. Our personalized approach ensures every detail reflects your unique vision.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Passion for Music, Dedication to Excellence
about.description: Soulmates Orchestra was born from a passion for music and a dedication to creating unforgettable moments. With years of experience performing at the most prestigious venues, we've perfected the art of reading the room and delivering exactly what each event needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform every event into an extraordinary experience through the power of live music, bringing people together and creating memories that last a lifetime.

items.title: Musical Excellence
items.description: Our musicians are conservatory-trained professionals with decades of combined experience.

items.title: Versatility
items.description: From classical elegance to contemporary hits, we seamlessly adapt to any musical style.

items.title: Personalization
items.description: Every event is unique, and we work closely with you to create a customized experience.

items.title: Reliability
items.description: Professional, punctual, and prepared - we handle every detail so you can enjoy your event.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's create something extraordinary together
contact.description: Ready to elevate your event? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your event vision...
form.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.

footer.tagline: Creating unforgettable moments through the power of live music.
